Articles.Content:
Bonjour, avez vous prévu un patch de traduction prochainement?

 

Hi, Will you do a translate patch soon?

 

Thank you

Greetings from America!

A quick google search found a mod that seems good: http://www.ksppatch.sitew.org/#Downloads.A

I have not used it but I hope it works for you.

 

Salutations de l'Amérique !

Une rapide recherche sur Google a trouvé un mod qui semble bon : http://www.ksppatch.sitew.org/#Downloads.A

Je ne l'ai pas utilisé, mais je l'espère fonctionne pour vous.

Squad has mention in the past that they would like to ad localization, mainly language support to KSP and have previously actively worked towards this goal. I don't know when this feature would be completed but I do think it is necessary.

thanks you

Edited June 10, 2016 by mignelus
From experience, if there is a way, I highly recommend using Crowdin as a localization tool. I have gone through many tools but none are as useful and accessible as Crowdin.
